item.description:
Come and view the vegetables grown by your group organizer, totally without soil, pesticides or artificial fertilizers.

 

 

 

 

Tour the set-up she put together and learn from her innovative solutions to each challenge encountered along the way. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Ask questions as you view her demonstration of table-top bucket systems and vertical hydroponic/aeroponic trickle down systems. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

You will be able to understand the pro's and con's of each approach and why it is a good idea to use both.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

You'll love the way plants can be moved around to better locations without damaging them, since you can easily bring the root system attached (as shown in photo below).

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

And the good news is that you can grow your own vegetables too... even if you don't own your own home or have space for an outdoor garden!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Click on the photo of Group Organizer's Tower Garden below if you are interested to know more about this convenient invention!

 

Each attendee can take home something.

You can take some lettuce home in a plastic bag which includes the root system.

That means it is still alive, and will keep a very long time!

When you get home, you can plant it outside, or set in in a dark bottle to continue growing inside.  Group organizer who is hosting this will show you how to do that too!

Photos here were taken earlier in the season. 

Much more growth now! 

But keep in mind that whenever we meet at organizer's home, it will be on a Tuesday rather than a Thursday. 

                                         ******

To better understand why our very survival depends upon personal preparedness steps we  take now, please view the following links:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eidQTDjQ5gw   (Crash Course - The Three E's)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nI-BIVWlc7A    (Resources & Monetary Systems)

http://projectcamelotproductions.com/interviews/ashayana_deane/ashayana_deane.html (2012 Cosmic Energy Changes)

Details about each monthly topic will be added a month before the Meetup date. Please feel free to make suggestions for future topics. 

The quickest way to contact the group organizer is by sending an e-mail to info@ulcsclinic.com.  Please enter "Meetup Member" in subj. line.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup sign on one of the tables.

group.name: Back to Basics: Sustainable Self-Sufficient Healthy Living

item.name: Hydroponic Harvest: From 2 different types of systems at home of group organizer
